text: Alloh conhoro ʙa hangomi murdanason megirad va in margest, ki acali inson ʙa pojon merasad va niz megirad coni kasonero, ki dar xoʙi xud namurdaand (ja'ne, acali onho hanuz ʙa sar narasidaast). Conhoero, ki hukmi marg ʙar onho ronda suda, nigah medorad va in coni kasest, ki ʙimirad va coni digaronro to zamone, ki muajjan ast, ʙoz mefiristad va in coni kasest, ki az xoʙ ʙarmexezad. Haroina, dar in giriftani conho va nigoh dostan jo pas firistodani onho iʙrathoi ravsanest ʙar qudrati Alloh ʙaroi onhoe, ki meandesand
